Package org.xflatdb.xflat

This package contains the public interface for XFlat.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Cursor<T>
    A Cursor is an Iterable that maintains references to a resource, and must be closed in a finally block.
    Database
    An interface for a Database managing one or more Tables.
    The Database allows getting and using Tables, and also provides access to the TransactionManager which can open Transactions.
    Table<T>
    Represents a table in the database.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DatabaseConfig
    The Configuration for a new XFlat Database.
    ShardsetConfig<T>
    Represents the configuration for a sharded table.
    TableConfig
    Represents the configuration of one table.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DuplicateKeyException
    An XflatException thrown when a unique ID is duplicated in a table.
    EngineStateException
    An XflatException thrown when the engine is in an unusable state for the current operation.
    KeyNotFoundException
    An XflatException thrown when a given ID is expected to be present but is not.
    XFlatException
    The base class for all normal exceptions thrown by XFlat.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Id
    Marks one java bean property as the ID.

Package org.xflatdb.xflat Description

This package contains the public interface for XFlat. All the classes important for accessing and modifying data in the database go here.
